item.title: dakchi
item.description:
[!WARNING] the advantage is that you get the biggest on the sides so you dont search for it maticulously

sudo code

phase 1: move to b

cases

while(stack_a){ if top in range : pb and if top->next > top sb; if top <= range : pb and rb; else(top<range) : ra; range++ after each move and when end = size-1 icrease only the start; }

phase 2: ; push it back to a sorted

while(stack_b){

  • half_size = get half the size of the stack ;
  • biggest_node_index = serch for biggest in in stack_b and get its index ;
  • biggest_node_index < half_size ? yes = rotate untile you get it : no = rrb til you get it; }
